review: I've had the Fire TV for about a week. I used to use my sons old WII to stream Netflix and YouTube. It was working as good and it would buffer a lot. I haven't had any issues with the Fire TV. It is very easy to use. I just wish it had an off and on button. When I'm done using it I just turn my TV off but the Fire TV eventually goes to sleep.

review: I love the Amazon Fire products!  I have had smart TV's and smart Blu ray players, but they all seem to have their own proprietary software with limitations.  So far, I am able to watch all my 'Smart Media' through the Amazon products.  I have the Fire Stick and the Fire TV.  I started with the Fire Stick and loved it so much, decided to try out the Fire TV.  I love the voice remote option.  I would highly recommend this over Chrome Cast or WD Media devices, both of which I have.
